title: Prime Finds: Clever kids toy storage solutions to help your home stay mess-free
text:
In this week's edition of her Prime Finds series, Shopping Writer Meghan has picked her Top 5 storage solutions to keeping kids' belongings tidy without breaking the bank In this week's instalment of my Prime Finds series, I've scoured Amazon for some of the best storage solutions you can buy to help manage the mess in your child's or children's rooms.
Whether you're looking for something simple and minimalist to ensure their favourite stuffed toys, Lego sets and board games are kept out of the way - or whether you're looking for something that offers multiple uses to keep you and your kids entertained and mess-free this January - I've got you covered. Here are my Top 5 storage solutions on Amazon to keep your home organised without breaking the bank.

1. Stuffed Animal Storage Bean Bag
Shop here for £22.59
Image: Amazon) Amazon)
Up first is an innovative option I probably could've used when I was younger. At just over £20, this stuffed animal storage find offers a variety of uses beyond keeping your kid's beloved plushies in one place. You fill the cylindrical cover with their stuffed friends, zip from top to bottom, and viola—you now have a multi-functional piece of furniture that can be used for multiple purposes, and the mess is kept at bay.
They can use it as a pillow, bean bag seat, boxing bag (that won't hurt their little hands), or just as a convenient and easy-to-use storage solution that makes putting stuffed toys away and retrieving them so much easier.
2. Toy Box Storage Chest with Wheels
Shop here for £25.99
Image: Amazon) Amazon)
